snippet: The chief executive of the American Egg Board, Joanne Ivy, has stepped down earlier than planned after the release of emails indicating she had tried to stop the sale of a vegan mayo at Whole Foods.
abstract: American Egg Board chief executive Joanne Ivy steps down earlier than planned after emails show she attempted to stop sale of vegan mayonnaise at Whole Foods.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive of the American Egg Board, Joanne Ivy, has stepped down earlier than planned after the release of emails indicating she had tried to stop the sale of a vegan mayo at Whole Foods.

headline.print_headline: Egg Board Chief Retires Early After Move On ‘Mayo’
headline.main: Egg Board Chief Retires Early After Move on ‘Mayo’
